title: Joel The Fixer
description: This week we are joined by famed Panamanian fixer from our travels to the land great canals; Joel Bolanos.  Joel gives us the run-down on his famed Suzuki Samurai with a Sidekick motor swap, we take delivery of a BMW 1M from Dinan alongside the new Subaru WRX while discussing the car culture in Panama. Thad and Zack spend some quality time with the new Porsche 911 Turbo S, we share some not-so-kind words regarding the dilution of the C7 Z06 and Matt almost drives the new Camaro Z28.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)

Thad and Zack spend some quality time with the new Porsche 911 Turbo S, we share some not-so-kind words regarding the dilution of the C7 Z06 and Matt almost drives the new Camaro Z28.
